title: Attribute Set
description: Named Attribute Set for Query Parameter 'includefields' of QIDO-RS and WADO-RS Metadata or by Query Parameter 'comparefield' of DIFF-RS requests.

dicomDescription.title: Attribute Set Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of this Attribute Set

dcmAttributeSetType.title: Attribute Set Type
dcmAttributeSetType.description: Specifies if this Attribute Set is used by Query Parameter 'includefields' of QIDO-RS and WADO-RS Metadata or by Query Parameter 'comparefield' of DIFF-RS requests.

dcmAttributeSetID.title: Attribute Set ID
dcmAttributeSetID.description: ID used by Query Parameter 'includefields' of QIDO-RS and WADO-RS Metadata requests and by Query Parameter 'comparefield' of DIFF-RS requests to refer this Attribute Set.

dcmAttributeSetNumber.title: Attribute Set Number
dcmAttributeSetNumber.description: Number used to order Attribute Sets.

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: Boolean to indicate whether this Attribute Set is presently installed on the archive device
